name: Half-risen: A Skeleton's Quest
description:
Truly a dungeon-crawler!

Trapped in a dank, torch-lit dungeon, and BOUNDED by a legless existence, traverse through the tomb and obtain 5 mystic jewels to earn your freedom!

Use your head! Throw your own skull around to knock over blocks, clearing obstacles in the way of those precious jewels!

Find keys and unlock doors! Topple towers of blocks! Open the portal and escape!

Good Luck!

*bone sounds*
